response.overview: Heather Anderson may be the greatest hiker to ever walk the earth. She has consistently broken the male and female thru hiking records on some of the worlds longest and most challenging trails. And yet, she has remained a mysterious figure to most. In this short documentary we explore Heatherâ€™s personal journey from unknown hiker to the holder of some of the most coveted records in the hiking world.
response.title: THE GHOST
